scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "ELEVENTY,EXPRESS,SYSTEM" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgBlack.red.bold" "eleventy --serve --port=8080" "node server.js" "wait-on http://localhost:8080 && wait-on http://localhost:8081 && echo ELEVENTY running at http://localhost:8080 and EXPRESS running at http://localhost:8081"
